statements: SELECT * FROM IoT_Data;
SELECT device_id, temperature FROM IoT_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, humidity FROM IoT_Data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Data WHERE humidity < 60;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM IoT_Data;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Data WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, temperature FROM IoT_Data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM IoT_Data GROUP BY device_id HAVING AVG(temperature) > 30;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM IoT_Data WHERE humidity > 60 ORDER BY temperature DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM IoT_Data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM sensors
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE data_value > 10
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(data_value) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type='temperature';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type='humidity' AND location='kitchen';
SELECT COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_sensors FROM sensors;
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS avg_value, sensor_id FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT device_name, last_update FROM devices ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT dashboard_id, dashboard_name, dashboard_url FROM dashboard_data ORDER BY dashboard_name;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'mobile' ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE last_update >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_url FROM dashboard_data WHERE dashboard_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY dashboard_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type LIKE '%temperature%' OR sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices JOIN sensor_data ON devices.device_id = sensor_data.device_id WHERE devices.device_type = 'laptop' AND sensor_value < 30 ORDER BY sensor_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_status = TRUE;
SELECT dashboard_name, creation_date FROM dashboards ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT stream_id, stream_value, timestamp FROM data_streams WHERE device_id = 'fcb5b5b1-2fd7-4acf-970a-1cb97e625749';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_streams FROM data_streams GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Smartphone';
SELECT dashboard_name, creation_date FROM dashboards WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_streams WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY stream_value DESC;
SELECT aggregation_type, aggregation_value FROM data_aggregation ORDER BY aggregation_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM iot_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM iot_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, data_stream FROM iot_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM dashboard_users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT visualization_type, visualization_data FROM dashboard_visualizations ORDER BY visualization_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM iot_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM iot_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT stream_id, stream_data FROM data_streams WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM dashboard_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT visualization_type, visualization_data FROM dashboard_visualizations WHERE visualization_type = 'chart';
